## üîí Business Rules & Constraints (CRITICAL)

ƒê√¢y l√† c√°c r√†ng bu·ªôc nghi·ªáp v·ª• c·ªët l√µi m√† **M·ªåI thay ƒë·ªïi ph·∫£i tu√¢n th·ªß**. Khi thi·∫øt k·∫ø database, API, ho·∫∑c UI logic, PH·∫¢I ki·ªÉm tra v·ªõi c√°c quy t·∫Øc n√†y:

### 1. Account & Authentication Rules
- **Unique Account**: M·ªói h·ªçc sinh ƒë∆∞·ª£c c·∫•p **1 t√†i kho·∫£n duy nh·∫•t** tr√™n h·ªá th·ªëng
  - Implementation: `StudentId` (MSSV) l√† Primary Key, UNIQUE constraint
  - Kh√¥ng cho ph√©p duplicate accounts v·ªõi c√πng email ho·∫∑c student ID
  
### 2. Student-Class Relationship
- **One Student - One Class**: M·ªói h·ªçc sinh **ch·ªâ thu·ªôc v√†o m·ªôt l·ªõp** nh·∫•t ƒë·ªãnh
  - Implementation: Foreign Key `ClassId` trong b·∫£ng `Students` (NOT NULL)
  - Relationship: One-to-Many (m·ªôt l·ªõp ‚Üí nhi·ªÅu h·ªçc sinh, m·ªôt h·ªçc sinh ‚Üí m·ªôt l·ªõp)
  - Business Logic: Khi chuy·ªÉn l·ªõp, ph·∫£i update `ClassId`, kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c thu·ªôc nhi·ªÅu l·ªõp c√πng l√∫c

### 3. Exam Access Control (Time-based)
- **Scheduled Access Only**: H·ªçc sinh ch·ªâ c√≥ th·ªÉ l√†m b√†i thi v√†o **ƒë√∫ng th·ªùi gian ƒë√£ l√™n l·ªãch**
  - Implementation: Check `StartDate <= CurrentTime <= EndDate` tr∆∞·ªõc khi cho ph√©p truy c·∫≠p
  - Business Logic: 
    - Tr∆∞·ªõc `StartDate`: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã "Ch∆∞a ƒë·∫øn gi·ªù thi" + disable button
    - Trong kho·∫£ng `StartDate - EndDate`: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã "B·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu thi" + enable button
    - Sau `EndDate`: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã "ƒê√£ k·∫øt th√∫c" ho·∫∑c "Xem k·∫øt qu·∫£"
  - UI Pattern: 3 tr·∫°ng th√°i badge (upcoming/in-progress/completed) nh∆∞ trong `StudentController.MyExams()`

### 4. Auto-Submit on Timeout
- **Forced Submission**: Khi h·∫øt th·ªùi gian, h·ªá th·ªëng **t·ª± ƒë·ªông n·ªôp b√†i** cho h·ªçc sinh
  - Implementation: JavaScript `setTimeout()` theo `duration` c·ªßa exam
  - Backend Validation: Ki·ªÉm tra `SubmitTime - StartTime <= Duration` khi nh·∫≠n submission
  - Business Logic: ƒê·∫£m b·∫£o t·∫•t c·∫£ h·ªçc sinh c√≥ **c√πng th·ªùi gian l√†m b√†i** (fairness)

### 5. Manual Grading by Admin
- **No Auto-Grading**: H·ªá th·ªëng **KH√îNG t·ª± ƒë·ªông ch·∫•m ƒëi·ªÉm** sau khi h·ªçc sinh n·ªôp b√†i
  - Implementation: Tr∆∞·ªùng `GradedAt` v√† `GradedBy` trong b·∫£ng `ExamResults` (nullable)
  - Business Logic: 
    - Submission ‚Üí Status = "Submitted", Score = NULL
    - Admin clicks "Ch·∫•m b√†i" ‚Üí Status = "Graded", Score = calculated value
  - UI: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã "ƒêang ch·ªù ch·∫•m ƒëi·ªÉm" n·∫øu `GradedAt == null`

### 6. Exam Immutability After Publishing
- **Locked After Save**: Sau khi l∆∞u, gi√°o vi√™n **KH√îNG ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√©p s·ª≠a** ƒë·ªÅ thi v√† ƒë√°p √°n
  - Implementation: 
    - Tr∆∞·ªùng `IsPublished` (boolean) trong b·∫£ng `Exams`
    - Tr∆∞·ªùng `PublishedAt` (DateTime, nullable) ƒë·ªÉ track th·ªùi ƒëi·ªÉm publish
  - Business Logic:
    - Draft mode (`IsPublished = false`): Cho ph√©p edit/delete
    - Published mode (`IsPublished = true`): Disable edit buttons, show warning n·∫øu c·ªë g·∫Øng s·ª≠a
  - Exception: C√≥ th·ªÉ s·ª≠a n·∫øu **ch∆∞a c√≥ h·ªçc sinh n√†o l√†m** (check `COUNT(Submissions) == 0`)

### 7. Multiple Choice Question Structure
- **4 Options Maximum**: M·ªói c√¢u h·ªèi tr·∫Øc nghi·ªám c√≥ **t·ªëi ƒëa 4 ph∆∞∆°ng √°n** (A, B, C, D)
  - Implementation: B·∫£ng `QuestionOptions` v·ªõi `OptionOrder` (1-4)
  - Validation: Frontend v√† Backend ƒë·ªÅu check `optionCount <= 4`
- **Single Answer Only**: H·ªçc sinh ch·ªâ ƒë∆∞·ª£c ch·ªçn **1 trong 4** ph∆∞∆°ng √°n
  - Implementation: Radio button (NOT checkbox) trong UI
  - Database: L∆∞u `SelectedOptionId` (single FK), kh√¥ng ph·∫£i array

### 8. No Overlapping Exam Schedule
- **Schedule Conflict Prevention**: Admin ph·∫£i ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o **kh√¥ng c√≥ m√¥n thi n√†o c·ªßa c√πng m·ªôt l·ªõp b·ªã ƒëan ch√©o th·ªùi gian**
  - Implementation: Validation function khi t·∫°o/update exam schedule:
    ```csharp
    // Pseudo-code
    CheckScheduleConflict(classId, newStartDate, newEndDate) {
        existingExams = GetExamsForClass(classId);
        foreach (exam in existingExams) {
            if (newStartDate < exam.EndDate && newEndDate > exam.StartDate) {
                throw ConflictException("Tr√πng l·ªãch thi v·ªõi m√¥n " + exam.Subject);
            }
        }
    }
    ```
  - UI: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã warning/error khi detect conflict, suggest alternative time slots

### 9. No Delete for Master Data
- **Soft Delete Only**: Admin **kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√©p x√≥a** (hard delete) c√°c th√¥ng tin: L·ªõp, Kh√≥a h·ªçc, M√¥n h·ªçc
  - Implementation: 
    - Th√™m tr∆∞·ªùng `IsDeleted` (boolean, default = false) v√†o c√°c b·∫£ng master data
    - Thay v√¨ `DELETE FROM Classes`, d√πng `UPDATE Classes SET IsDeleted = true`
  - Business Logic: Filter `WHERE IsDeleted = false` trong m·ªçi queries
  - UI: Hide delete button ho·∫∑c disable v·ªõi tooltip "Kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ph√©p x√≥a d·ªØ li·ªáu g·ªëc"

### 10. Cascade Delete for Student Data
- **Full Data Removal**: Khi x√≥a h·ªçc sinh, ph·∫£i **ƒë·ªìng th·ªùi x√≥a to√†n b·ªô**: ƒêi·ªÉm thi, B√†i l√†m, Submissions
  - Implementation: Database `ON DELETE CASCADE` cho Foreign Keys:
    ```sql
    -- Example
    ALTER TABLE ExamResults 
    ADD CONSTRAINT FK_ExamResults_Students
    FOREIGN KEY (StudentId) REFERENCES Students(StudentId) 
    ON DELETE CASCADE;
    ```
  - Business Logic: Khi x√≥a student, t·ª± ƒë·ªông trigger cascade delete cho:
    - `ExamResults` (ƒëi·ªÉm thi)
    - `ExamSubmissions` (b√†i l√†m)
    - `StudentAnswers` (c√¢u tr·∫£ l·ªùi chi ti·∫øt)
  - UI: Hi·ªÉn th·ªã confirmation popup nghi√™m t√∫c: "X√≥a h·ªçc sinh s·∫Ω x√≥a to√†n b·ªô d·ªØ li·ªáu li√™n quan. Kh√¥ng th·ªÉ ho√†n t√°c!"

### üö® Validation Checklist (Before Implementing Any Feature)

Tr∆∞·ªõc khi code, PH·∫¢I ki·ªÉm tra:
- [ ] Feature n√†y c√≥ vi ph·∫°m quy t·∫Øc n√†o trong 10 rules tr√™n kh√¥ng?

## Project Overview

E_TestHub is an ASP.NET Core 8.0 MVC online exam platform with **role-based architecture** (Student, Teacher, Admin). Currently at v0.3.0 with Student module completed, pending database integration.

## Critical Architecture Patterns

### Authentication & Session Management
- **BaseController** (`Controllers/BaseController.cs`) is the authentication gateway - ALL protected controllers inherit from it
- Session-based auth using `HttpContext.Session` with keys: `UserId`, `UserName`, `UserRole`
- Demo credentials in `UserService.cs`: `student@demo.com/student123`, `teacher@demo.com/teacher123`
- BCrypt password hashing via `BCrypt.Net-Next` package
- No database yet - using in-memory `List<User>` in UserService

### Controller Structure
```
HomeController ‚Üí Public (Index, Login) - NO authentication
BaseController ‚Üí Abstract authentication layer
  ‚îú‚îÄ StudentController ‚Üí Student features (Dashboard, MyExams, ExamInfo, TakeExam, ViewResults, Profile)
  ‚îú‚îÄ TeacherController ‚Üí Teacher features (Dashboard only - 10% complete)
  ‚îî‚îÄ AdminController ‚Üí Admin features (Dashboard only - 10% complete)
```

### CSS Organization (CRITICAL - Recently Reorganized)
**DO NOT** use old paths like `~/css/dashboard.css`. Use modular structure:
```
wwwroot/css/
  ‚îú‚îÄ shared/dashboard.css      ‚Üí All dashboard layouts
  ‚îú‚îÄ student/*.css             ‚Üí Student-specific pages
  ‚îú‚îÄ auth/login.css            ‚Üí Authentication pages
  ‚îî‚îÄ public/index.css          ‚Üí Public pages
```

**View @section Styles pattern:**
```csharp
@section Styles {
    <link href="~/css/shared/dashboard.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="~/css/student/my-exams.css" rel="stylesheet">
}
```

## Key Workflows

### Adding New Student Features
1. Create action in `StudentController.cs` (inherits BaseController automatically)
2. Create view in `Views/Student/[ActionName].cshtml` with Layout: `_DashboardLayout.cshtml`
3. Add CSS in `wwwroot/css/student/[feature-name].css` (kebab-case)
4. Reference CSS using modular path in view's `@section Styles`
5. Add navigation link in `_DashboardLayout.cshtml` sidebar

### Running the Project
```bash
cd E_TestHub  # Navigate to project folder, NOT solution folder
dotnet run
# Access: http://localhost:5230
```

### Demo Data Patterns
- Exam status logic uses **fixed date** `new DateTime(2025, 9, 28)` for demo consistency
- ExamInfo shows different buttons based on status: "B·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu thi" (in-progress only), "Ch∆∞a ƒë·∫øn gi·ªù thi" (upcoming), "Xem k·∫øt qu·∫£" (completed)
- ViewResults has 12 hardcoded English questions - see `Views/Student/ViewResults.cshtml` lines 60-500

## Naming Conventions (ENFORCE STRICTLY)
- **Controllers**: PascalCase (`StudentController.cs`)
- **Actions**: PascalCase (`MyExams()`, `ViewResults()`)
- **Views**: PascalCase (`MyExams.cshtml`)
- **CSS Files**: kebab-case (`my-exams.css`, `view-results.css`)
- **CSS Classes**: kebab-case (`.exam-status`, `.action-card`, `.question-grid`)
- **JavaScript**: camelCase (`showQuestion()`, `updateNavigationButtons()`)

## ViewBag Conventions
Set in BaseController, available in all authenticated views:
- `ViewBag.UserId` - Current user ID
- `ViewBag.UserName` - Display name
- `ViewBag.UserRole` - "Student" | "Teacher" | "Admin"

Additional ViewBag used in specific controllers:
- `ViewBag.ExamId` - Set in StudentController.ExamInfo(int examId)
- `ViewBag.ExamStatus` - "upcoming" | "in-progress" | "completed"

## Common Patterns

### Status Badge System
Three states across platform:
- **upcoming** (yellow): `.exam-status.upcoming` with badge "S·∫Øp di·ªÖn ra"
- **in-progress** (green): `.exam-status.in-progress` with badge "ƒêang di·ªÖn ra"
- **completed** (gray): `.exam-status.completed` with badge "ƒê√£ ho√†n th√†nh"

### Responsive Grid Pattern
Used consistently in action cards, exam lists:
```css
display: grid;
grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
gap: 20px;
```

### Link Routing Pattern
```csharp
// With route parameter
<a href="@Url.Action("ExamInfo", "Student", new { examId = 1 })">

// Simple navigation
<a href="@Url.Action("MyExams", "Student")">
```

## Dependencies
- **BCrypt.Net-Next 4.0.3** - Only external package besides Microsoft defaults
- Bootstrap 5.3.0, Font Awesome 6.x (from CDN in layouts)
- jQuery 3.7.0, jQuery Validation (in `wwwroot/lib/`)

## Planned Architecture Changes (DO NOT IMPLEMENT YET)
- Entity Framework Core integration (Q4 2025)
- ASP.NET Core Identity (Q1 2026)
- Repository pattern (Q1 2026)
- RESTful API (Q2 2026)

## Debugging Notes
- Session data persists for 30 minutes (configured in Program.cs)
- If redirected to Login unexpectedly, check BaseController.OnActionExecuting
- CSS not loading? Verify path uses new modular structure
- Demo users never change - hardcoded in UserService constructor

## Testing Credentials
```
Student:  student@demo.com  / student123
Teacher:  teacher@demo.com  / teacher123
Admin:    admin@demo.com    / admin123
```
